body:
Do you know how many doujinshi there are with bike shorts? 

Not enough! Never enough! 

There is no such thing as too much spats. To achieve such a state, one must first have enough doujinshi artists who can draw them. Since such a state (enough doujinshi artists) is purely theoretical, it's impossible to get enough spats doujinshi. QED.*

* Well, that and the insatiable lust of spats loving readers. #spats
